description: The libvirt image cache manager incorrectly treats the .sha1 hash files as images.
title: Base image signature files are not images

comments.content: The libvirt image cache manager incorrectly treats the .sha1 hash files as images.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mikal

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/5898
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/38bc2d329581bf85d131e0025a13c7e87ea9f107
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 38bc2d329581bf85d131e0025a13c7e87ea9f107
Author: Michael Still <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Mar 28 15:00:45 2012 +1100

    Base image signature files are not images.
    
    Stop treating base image signature files as images. Resolves bug 967843.
    
    Change-Id: Iad2f27e07a6a9887785bb4dab44476c62cd11a69
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
